title: Personalized Health Plan
description: Trusted Naturopathic Doctors, Acupuncture & Chinese Medicine & Integrative & Functional Medicine serving the communities of Las Vegas, NV. Contact us at 702-708-2207 or visit us at 3030 S. Jones Blvd., Ste 107, Las Vegas, NV 89146.
cleaned_text: Our Personalized Wellness Program Includes... - In-depth case assessment - Access to Online Wellness Curriculum - Monthly visits with Dr. Lee-Sedera - 45-60 mins per visit - Regular follow-up with wellness coach - Personalized nutrition plan - Unlimited email consult with Dr. Lee-Sedera - Group support from our private FB community - Functional lab tests - Pharmaceutical grade supplements at VIP member's rate - Optional acupuncture sessions at VIP member's rate
